sentences.english: The morphological characters for species identification are illustrated and a key to the species of white grubs in lawns in Beijing is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供了鉴别特征图和北京地区草坪蛴螬种类检索表。

sentences.english: Mixed populations of peanut white grubs display an aggregated pattern of distribution.
sentences.chinese: 花生蛴螬田间分布属于聚集分布。

sentences.english: The white grubs present an aggregate distribution in the peanut fields.
sentences.chinese: 蛴螬在花生地呈聚集分布型。

sentences.english: It was also known to eat worms and grubs from bark and moss.
sentences.chinese: 他们也吃树皮或苔藓中的蠕虫和蛴螬。

sentences.english: White grub is one oft he major underground pests in peanut fields in the north of Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 蛴螬是豫北地区花生田的主要地下害虫之一。

sentences.english: You will be greeted by the GRUB screen.
sentences.chinese: 你将迎接由蛴螬的画面。

definition: mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
army worm (e.g. Mythimna separata or Leucania separata etc, major cereal pests)
boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
trichlorphon C4H8Cl3PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide/also called dipterex
looper caterpillar, larva of moth in family Geometridae/inch worm
